title: optical_filter
description: The "optical_filter" object describes properties of a single optical filter that was used during BRDF measurements. Note that the same object describes optical filters integrated to illumination or detection systems.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of an optical filter used for BRDF measurements as a text (i.e.string).

model.title: model
model.description: Model of an optical filter used for BRDF measurements as a text (i.e.string).

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of an optical filter used for BRDF measurements as a text (i.e.string).

type.title: type
type.description: Type of an optical filter used for BRDF measurements. For example, interference filter, neutral density filter, absorptive filter etc. as a text (i.e.string).

material.title: material
material.description: Material of an optical filter used for BRDF measurements as a text (i.e.string).

cut_on_wl.title: cut_on_wl
cut_on_wl.description: A cut-on wavelength of an optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the cut-on wavelength as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter cut-on wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

cut_off_wl.title: cut_off_wl
cut_off_wl.description: A cut-off wavelength of an optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter cut-off wavelength as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter cut-off wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

wl_range.title: wl_range
wl_range.description: The field describing transmission wavelength range of the optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "min_value", "max_value" and "unit".

min_value.title: value
min_value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's transmission shortest wavelength as a number.

max_value.title: value
max_value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's transmission longest wavelength as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's transmission shortest and longest wavelengths as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

central_wl.title: central_wl
central_wl.description: The central transmission wavelength of the of the optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter central wavelength as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter central wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

transmission_FWHM.title: transmission_FWHM
transmission_FWHM.description: Full Width at Half Maximum of the spectral transmission range of the optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's transmission FWHM as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's transmission FWHM as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

transmission_avg.title: transmission_avg
transmission_avg.description: Average transmission value of the optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's average transmission value as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's average transmission value as a string that can have values "%" or "" i.e. unitless.

min_transmission.title: min_transmission
min_transmission.description: Minimal transmission value of the optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's minimal transmission value as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's minimal transmission value as a string that can have values "%" or "" i.e. unitless.

max_transmission.title: max_transmission
max_transmission.description: Maximal transmission value of the optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's maximal transmission value as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's maximal transmission value as a string that can have values "%" or "" i.e. unitless.

blocking_avg.title: blocking_avg
blocking_avg.description: Average blocking/absorption value of the optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's average blocking/absorption value as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's average blocking/absorption as a string that can have value "OD" (optical density).

min_blocking.title: min_blocking
min_blocking.description: Minimal blocking/absorption value of the optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's minimal blocking/absorption value as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's minimal blocking/absorption as a string that can have value "OD" (optical density).

max_blocking.title: max_blocking
max_blocking.description: Maximal blocking/absorption value of the optical filter used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's maximal blocking/absorption value as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's maximal blocking/absorption as a string that can have value "OD" (optical density).

damage_treshold.title: damage_treshold
damage_treshold.description: Field describing maximal optical power at which optical filter is designed to be operated. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the maximal optical power at which optical filter is designed to be operated as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the maximal optical power at which optical filter is designed to be operated as a string that can have values "pW", "nW", "μW", "mW", "W", "kW", "MW" or "GW".

data_links.title: data_links
data_links.description: An object that allows to refer to available external technical information regarding optical filter used for BRDF measurements. Array of URL links as a text (i.e.string).

comments.title: comments
comments.description: An object that allows to provide any additional information regarding used for BRDF measurements. Array of text (i.e.string) URL links.

adhoc_section.title: adhoc_section
adhoc_section.description: An object containing user defined keys describing any information relevant to the optical filter placed in in the path of light of illumination source that cannot be presented within "filter" object properties provided by schema. Adhoc section can contain all types of entries.
